element.name: Ray of Fatigue
element.supports: Dread Necromancer, Ranged, Spell Attack, Spell Saving Throw

description.p: An iridescent violet beam flashes out from your hand towards a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target is exhausted. Multiple instances of this spell against the same target do not stack. At the end of each of the target's turns, it can make a Constitution saving throw against the spell. On a success, the spell ends.
